name: Goose Boiled with Onion Sauce
description: This is a boiled goose with sage and onions inside.

recipeInstructions.name: Singe and hang
recipeInstructions.text: When your goose is nicely prepared, singe it, and pour over it a quart of boiling milk; let it stand in the milk all night...

recipeInstructions.name: Dry and season
recipeInstructions.text: ... then take it out and dry it exceedingly well with a cloth, season it with pepper and salt, ...

recipeInstructions.name: Stuff
recipeInstructions.text: ... chop an onion and a handful of stage leaves, put them into your goose, se3w it up at the neck and vent, and hang it up by the neck till the next day; ...

recipeInstructions.name: Boil
recipeInstructions.text: ... then put it into a pan of cold water, cover it close, and let it boil slowly one hour.
